long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeOpt: ChatGPT Helper for Jupyter

CodeOpt is a Chrome extension for JupyterLab and Jupyter Notebook that integrates ChatGPT directly into your coding environment. This tool is designed to boost productivity by providing AI-powered assistance with a single click.

Key Features:

Direct AI Assistance: Sends code and output to ChatGPT with a toolbar button.
Customizable Interaction: Users can customize AI prompts for code and error messages.
Automatic Integration: Ensures the ChatGPT button appears in new JupyterLab cells.
Privacy-Focused: Only sends code and outputs chosen by the user.
Sleek Interface: Gradient-themed popup with intuitive controls.
Usage Examples:

Debugging: Quickly identify and fix errors in your code.
Refactoring: Improve code efficiency and readability.
Code Optimization: Enhance performance by optimizing algorithms.
Interactive Learning: Use AI feedback to learn coding best practices.

CodeOpt enhances your Jupyter experience by making complex coding tasks simpler and more interactive.
